page.title: 07LEISURE/RECREATION, CWMBRAN
page.content: {AFTER SCHOOL-ACTIVITIES-}27,ten-year old children were asked about their out -of- school activities.6 children attend church,chapel or Sunday School. 2 attend Girl Guides.7 attend Cubs.1 attends Scouts.4 attend Girls Brigade. 1 attends Boys Brigade.12 attend Junior Fellowship.4 are members of the village Football Team and 2 are members of the village choir.1 boy belongs to a local Rugby team.9 do not belong to any club.The hobbies followed were:-computers 15,collectors 18,swimming 13, cycling 10, reading 6, running 4, chess 1,horse-riding 2,lego4. When asked about the amount of spare time spent watching T.V.we were all shocked at the findings and so have produced another survey on this topic.
